reviews.sentence: Beautiful designs good food comfortable hotel. Last week I went with my friends for a birthday trick to Ginger Hotel. We nearly reached at 1 pm. At this time the hotel is packed with customer. The manager came to us and request for waiting. The hotel is beautifully designed and very comfortable. The food was very good specially Hyderabadi chicken. The service boy also good.

Great place to stay value fo. Ginger Hotel Bhubaneswar is a great place a short medium stay. it is very homely reasonably and well located with the basic things required for a pleasant and comfortable stay. The front desk service is prompt and breakfast spread is delicious and very reasonably priced. No frills here and that too has it is merits.

Rooms are spacious staff are punctual. Bhubaneswar is regarded as temple city. It is the heart of odisha the capital. The hotel is situated at a distance of about 1 km from Jayadev vihar bus stand towards Nandankanan. The hotel is built on a colossal building. Rooms are spacious comfortable luxurious. Room service is pretty fine. The swimming pool is manageable. The housekeeping service is quite good. The staff members are very amicable and punctual in their duties. If you visit BSR it is suggested one of the best hotel to stay at as it is quite affordable and may suit your pocket.

Good hotel in good location. Nothing special but good hotel. Good location and has good parking facilities. Prices of food are comparatively high. Cleanliness is the usp of the hotel. Calm and quiet place. Good greenery outside. Overall a pleasant stay.

Verygod. Hotel was a excellent. And location of the hotel wasa a excellent. Inside outside of hotel wasa very good. And tv fifi is excellent we were alots of enjoy of the hotel. And servicr wasa excellent anf food w a agod. And the hotel was a excellent.

Pleasant stay good location. Hotel is very nice to stay. Location is good service is good cleanliness is very good and foods are very tasty. It was really a wonderful experience at Ginger Bhubaneswar. The rooms and it is location are quite likeable. The services and hospitality are very pleasing. I had booked my room easily through MakeMyTrip and with a manageable price. I would to confess that this would be the best place to stay with best prices.

Good experience awesome loca. Staying in ginger a very good experience the location of hotel is awesome food facility and availability is good. specially coffee cafe day I like the combination with a hotel is good idea overall the experience is good.

Dipti receptionist. Good hospitality on the reception from miss Dipti. Hotel is good on acomodation and hospitality. Nice location and nice rooms. My stay was abpleasent one and all the crefits goes to the staffs. Good rating hotel in a budget price.

Business stay. Centrally located place in Bhubaneshwar. The hotel is able to make travel arrangements within the city and the place is not far from the airport or the railway station. Good for business traveller. Food choices for breakfast and lunch dinner can be improved. The staff is helpful and polite.

Best hotel full value for money. Never excepted it would be so awsm loved the romz very clean batrom awesome all bathroom ware international full value for money hotel. Looking forward to suggest people and making it my permanent destination if the price remain same anytime.

Average. A very mid to low budget hotel located very centrally having good access to the city centre is the USP of this very ordinary property. The rooms are very spartan have just about the very basic amenities the resteraunt serves a very basic fare. On the plus side the staff are very friendly and extremely helpful. I would recommend this place of you are traveling to Bhubaneswar on a very tight budget.

A prison cell with amenities. The rooms here are like prison cells having amenities. The room service is the worst. The quality of breakfast is bad. It is for people who like their office too much. The restaurant looks like a office cafeteria with plastic chairs and tables. Not something that I would look forward to in futurebr The colours used in the rooms were very depressing grey and white. Overall the rooms looked like prison cells with amenities. The room service was the worst provided serving spoon for eating meals and also found hair in the food.

THE SMART CARD USED FOR ENTERING AND EXITING THE ROOM WAS NOT WORKING AT THE TIME OF CHECK IN WE HAD TO GIVE IT TO THE RECEPTION TO GET IT ACTIVATED IN THE MORNING AS THEY SAID THE CARD ACTIVATOR WAS NOT WORKING WHEN WE CHECKED IN IT WOULD GET ACTIVATED ONLY IN THE MORNING.
Poorest service. I ’l not suggest it even to my enemy. No professionalism. Just making fool of people.

Pathetic. The hotel should be fully closed for renovations. Currently it is dusty noisy and very unsafe for stay. First I got room 11 and when I went to room it was open and not at all ready. I came back to reception and I was allotted a room. When I went inside the room was dirty bathroom was not clean toilet roll was not even folded properly. The bed sheet and blanket cover looks like used one. It had hairs and was wrinkled clearly showing it was not clean. Then I was given another room which had cleaner bed roll. But bathroom had same issue. The bathroom had only one big towel but no hand towel. Overall I will rate 15 at max.
Worst hotel I have ever seen.

Extremely rude and indifferent staff. I was made to stand at this property with my little kid. They took 30 minutes to figure out if they could accept my drivers license as an i d. Very rude staff and indifferent to the fact that I was carrying a little baby with me. I had to rebok again on my wifes name as she had an adhar card which they agreed to accept. They again denied me entry. Stood us up longer again. This time with my ailing and aging parents as well. No courtesy whatsoever. All this for just 2 hours of stay. I lost the money used in the first reservation as well.
Ginger Bhubaneswar terrible. The Hotel is under renovation and I was given a room where they are building the floor below. Noisy dangerous dirty.

wifi was down for two days. my first room I got moved because they are doing remodeling of building one. at 1030 pm I would enjoy the sweet sounds of table saws and wood chopping. Staff is very nice. Food is good. Cafe staff is amazing. But being here from the US and having lots of work to do not having wifi having construction outside my room. just very unprofessional things that guest should not have to deal with. The house keeping staff is great. I just think the front desk staff does not do a good job at ensuring the comfort of its guest. There should have been hot spots given to guests. There should never be someone working with table saws after 80 pm inside a hotel. I like the hotel but the over all experience has not been the best. I love the wait staff and the house keeping. Their great work kept me from giving a two star review.

Stayed here overnight to catch a flight from Bhuvaneswar. The hotel was heavily understaffed. They need more people especially in the dining department. The staff forgot to bill our a la carte meal bill during checkout. This resulted in a continuous series of phone calls till when they received my money transfer. Not a hassle free experience. Food was exquisite in the restaurant. Chef deserves full marks. Rooms were spartan and functional. Ac worked superbly well. The hotel is well located. Lobby is very sophisticated and trendy. Overall a good experience with a few glitches.
